text: Telmo Manuel Machado Pinto (born 18 January 1971) is a former Portuguese football player. He is currently the president of the junta de freguesia of Quarteira, elected from the Socialist Party. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primeira Liga for União de Leiria on 19 August 1995 as a second-half substitute in a 0–4 loss against Marítimo. He scored 4 goals for União de Leiria in the 1995 UEFA Intertoto Cup campaign. ==References== ==External links== Category:1971 births Category:People from Loulé Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Louletano D.C. players Category:U.D.
